strapiPost.title: Join The Walking Dead This Weekend In Eureka Springs
strapiPost.content:
Eureka Springs will be crawling with the walking dead during the Eureka Springs Zombie Crawl parade on Saturday, Oct 29 at 6p. 

  • A need to feed: The parade will include street performers, scary floats, and post-apocalyptic themed vehicles. The entry fee to join the parade is two cans of food to benefit the local food bank. 
  • Night walkers: Stranger Springs, the official after party of the Zombie Crawl for those 21+, will take place at the Best Western Convention Center from 8p-midnight featuring costume contests, 80â€™s synth wave, and more! 

Learn more and join the Eureka Springs Zombie Crawl HERE.
